definition: lacking or deprived of the sense of hearing wholly or in part, people who have severe hearing impairments, make or render deaf
details:
adjective
- lacking or deprived of the sense of hearing wholly or in part
- (usually followed by `to') unwilling or refusing to pay heed
= synonyms: indifferent
noun
- people who have severe hearing impairments
= example: people who have severe hearing impairments
verb
- make or render deaf
= example: make or render deaf
= synonyms: deafen
